personal_info_desc: This information is visible to all users in your teams
change_pass_desc: Update your credentials associated with this account
delete_profile_desc: Delete your account and all content related to it
view_profile: Look how others see my profile
logout_desc: This will end current session and you will need to sign in again
add_team_members_desc: Add new invitees to the list. They can later join your team using selective join link down below
manage_invitations_desc: Add users to waiting list so that they can join your team later. Public link allows everyone to go in. Refresh them at any time if you lost a link or it was compromised by unauthorized people
delete_team_desc: When you delete a team you delete all content related to it. No content recovery option is available, be careful
no_invited_users: You have not invited any users yet
leave_team_desc: To join again you will need a new invitation
general_info_desc: This info is accessible by everyone in the group. It is also seen in the invitation box for new members
transfer_ownership_desc: You can transfer ownership of this group to any admin. You will lose owner's functionality after that
transfer_ownership_searchbar: Email of the admin to transfer ownership
cookies_banner: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website
login_to_access: Sign in to your account to see this page
